What happened to kellyclarksonlive.com?

In June 2016, Kelly Clarkson began posting recordings of her live performances on www.kellyclarksonlive.com. Each month would feature a new song until early 2017 when new songs stopped appearing (in anticipation of her new album?).

Unfortunately, her IT support has let her down and instead of the site rendering you’ll get:

Error establishing a database connection

Fortunately I’ve found the direct links to the underlying hosting service:

  • Bang Bang // Ariana Grande, Nicki Minaj, Jessie J
  • Creep // Radiohead
  • Fix You // Coldplay
  • Hard Candy Christmas // Dolly Parton
  • Heartbeat Song // Kelly Clarkson
  • I’d Rather Go Blind // Etta James
  • I’ll Stand By You // The Pretenders
  • Love Me Like A Man // Bonnie Raitt
  • Oh Darlin’ // The Beatles
  • Ready For Love // India.Arie
  • Shake It Out // Florence And The Machine
  • Top Of The World // Dixie Chicks
  • Walkaway Joe // Trisha Yearwood
  • Walkaway/Uptown Funk // Kelly Clarkson/Mark Ronson feat. Bruno Mars
  • We Found Love // Calvin Harris featuring Rihanna
  • Wide Open Spaces // Dixie Chicks
  • You Don’t Know Me // Ray Charles

(right click -> save link as)

Enjoy!
